utilities

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class description: Represents the client playing Tic Tac Toe. Each player is a client
    Author:
    806547 Holly Harnack
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Client

        public Client()
        Default constructor

      • Client

        public Client(java.lang.String name,
              int port,
              java.lang.String IP,
              java.lang.String player,
              boolean first)
        Constructor that initializes all the client attributes
        Parameters:
        name - - name of the client
        port - - port that the client wants to connect to
        IP - - ip address the client wants to connect to
        player - - the player symbol of the client (either X or O)
        first - - boolean value stating if the player is first in the next game or not

    • Method Detail

      • getFirst

        public boolean getFirst()
        returns the boolean value stating if the client goes first the next game
        Returns:
        - true if the client goes first in the next game, false if they go last

      • setFirst

        public void setFirst(boolean first)
        set when it is known that this client will go first in the next game
        Parameters:
        first - - true if the client goes first next game, false if they dont
